Articles.Content:
So after the update it seems my tech tree quantum mechanic'd. The Whiplash engine is in two nodes at the same time and in one it's locked and in the other unlocked.

 

http://imgur.com/a/NaWBq

Whenever I try to launch a craft with it the game says that some parts of this vessel are locked.

I'm playing through Steam so it's the latest build.

Edited December 1, 2015 by Veeltch

Hi Veeltch, some parts were moved to new tech tree nodes but were not removed from the persistent.sfs to avoid deleting craft in flight.

 

You can easily fix this by editing the save file in a text editor (back it up by making a copy first though) and removing the redundant lines.
OK, thanks. I'll try to do that soon-ish. Not sure if I repped you or not.
